Posts.Content: Hi i finished my treatment a month ago . having it done is fine ..only abit uncomfortable having your arms back for 10 minutes....but you get use to it. I found i was getting tired easy in my third week which went on for around 3 weeks. Im still on reduced hours as i work full time which has really helped. Im wondering thou if anyone else who has had it done felt really low and fed up after 4 weeks pf the treatment ending. good luck with it your be fine. Xx
Posts.Title: About to start Radiotherapy in a couple of weeks. Help!

Posts.Content: Hi. Im a newby. I am 3 days from the end of 3 weeks of RT and experincing alot if hot flushes mostky night time. Has anyone ekse hsd this?
Posts.Title: hot sweats during radio therapy
